body.p: Got to admit, I love The Voice on t.v. & seeing Jesse J and Will.i.am battle! (Tom & Danny, Sorry!) – worry it my current opiate of the people. What I not seeing while watching? – 37

body.p: Now really in trouble! Love Chris Brown’s ‘Don’t Judge Me’ – but he beat RiRi and says her p―y his!!! Can’t buy that man’s music….can I?
As I write and you read – how close by is the woman being beaten….or raped….or murdered?

p.italic: 29th of each month in Lucknow, northern India, the women and girls of the Red Brigade carry their banners demanding “Stop rape now” & “We want safety” & in between times tackle any man who sexually harasses or threatens a woman.
when rape in India hit the world headlines – when rape in the world was as commonplace as the day rising. How shall WE respond? – 206

body.p: “Blasé ain’t you big daddy…you took my womb till it run, all of Ethiopia awaits you my prodigal son…blasé ain’t you” Jeanne Lee screams to Archie Shepp’s haunting sax5 – the music of the movement says it and I have bought this – in original vinyl and CD, is this one ok and Chris Brown not!!! – 152

43,748 hate crimes were recorded by police in England and Wales 2011/12: 82% race related; 10% sexual orientation related; 1% transgender related; 4% disability and religion related respectively6 – 54
Was chilling with the sun, the return of a long absent friend, then I saw those figures – knowing reported not the same as actual, it felt chilly again –12

Tension rising between the 2 Koreas and US. Heard man on radio say no real threat as N. Korea doesn’t have capacity to target US landmass. I think: but the women, men and children of Korean peninsula are within reach of them all. No real threat? To whom? – 114
Bob says: “have no fear of atomic energy”7 – I do, & believe “none a them can stop the time.” Oh Pirates, yes they drop I… – 3
Iraq 2003: another torture camp revealed with Brit soldiers involved (again)8 – gendered and homophobic dimensions of-course – I’m judging!! Have to in the absence of justice – 65
And I love Brown’s ‘Don’t Judge Me’…just had 10 seconds of it on my Shazam tag – not buying but no less a hypocrite..??

Two days ago Israeli planes bombed Gaza; yesterday Gazan’s attacked UN food-banks protesting decrease in supplies. Stocks decreasing cos the world not keeping level of supplies up – Palestine doesn’t matter – again. And the source of the violence is….? – 116
Gonna play DAM’s ‘I don’t have freedom’ – see if it lifts the mood #http://www.dampalestine.com/
